    • Constructor Detail

      • Protocoller

        public Protocoller(Client client,
                   java.lang.String addressAndPort)
            throws MalFormedServerAddressException,
                   ServerNotFoundException,
                   ServerCommunicationException
        Tries to set up a connection with a server specified in the String addressAndPort. If the server exists and responds it will setup and InputHandler and BufferedWriter.
        Parameters:
        client - The client object that utilizes this Protocoller.
        addressAndPort - a String containing the address and port number of a server.
        Throws:
        MalFormedServerAddressException
        ServerNotFoundException
        ServerCommunicationException

    • Method Detail

      • cmdHello

        public void cmdHello(java.lang.String username,
                     boolean isAi,
                     int clientCapabilities)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: Connect4Client
        Command to register this client on the server. If the registering is successful a response in the shape of the WELCOME command can be expected from the server.
        Specified by:
        cmdHello in interface Connect4Client
        Parameters:
        username - the desired username to be displayed on the scoreboard.
        clientCapabilities - an integer acting as a boolean flag vector. Every bit corresponds to a capability. Setting a certain bit to 0 means the client is reporting that it does not have an implementation for the associated capability.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • cmdGameRequest

        public void cmdGameRequest()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • cmdMove

        public void cmdMove(int x,
                    int y)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: Connect4Client
        The x and y coordinate of the desired move. The coordinate system is defined as follows:
        NB: See this javadoc in the editor for the correct layout in ASCII art
        x -->
        `O`` 0 1 2 3 4 5
        y `` _._._._._._
        ` 0 |_|_|_|_|_|_|
        | 1 |_|_|_|_|_|_|
        V 2 |_|_|_|_|_|_|
        ` 3 |_|_|_|_|_|_|
        Specified by:
        cmdMove in interface Connect4Client
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the move
        y - the y coordinate of the move
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • cmdChat

        public void cmdChat(java.lang.String msg)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: ChatCapabilityClient
        Send a chat message to the server, which in his turn will broadcast it to all capable clients.
        Specified by:
        cmdChat in interface ChatCapabilityClient
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to be sent
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the communication with the server.

      • parse

        public void parse(java.lang.String input)
           throws CommandFormatException
        Splits the message of the server to find commands given by the server. Throws and CommandFormatException when the received input does not match any known formats of Protocoller
        Parameters:
        input - String received from the server
        Throws:
        CommandFormatException
